title: ★ NO FEE ★ Brookline 1 Bdrm ★ Avail 9/1
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 182949570', 'Rent: $3,495 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Rent Includes:: Garbage, Heat', 'Parking:: no parking', 'LANDLORD IS PAYING BROKERAGE FEE!', 'Come in today and tour this large, newly renovated kitchen and bath apartment.', 'Features of these apartment includes gleaming hardwood floor, laundry in unit and lots of natural sunlight.', 'Kitchen is beautifully renovated with white cabinets, black granite countertops and stainless steel appliances.', 'Bus: 60 Walnut St @ High St (0.55 mi)', 'Tram: D Brookline Hills (0.49 mi)', 'Bus: Green Line D Shuttle Brookline Hills (0.47 mi)', 'Bus: 66 Harvard St @ Harris St (0.10 mi)', 'Bus: 51 Tappan St @', 'Greenough St (0.48 mi)', 'Bus: 65 Washington St @ Gardner Path (0.17 mi)', 'Tram: C Summit Avenue (0.25 mi)', 'FEATURES', 'A/C', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Unit', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Joyce Fung', '267 218 5231', 'Benjamin Apartments, LLC', '107 Brighton Avenue', 'Boston, MA 02134', 'Click here to search all of our available apartments!', '<URL>/', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
